description:
Mamiya tries to save Toki by firing a bowgun at Raoh, but the Two-Finger Vacuum Grasp sends the arrow back at her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Tatakai Raou tai Ken! Shinu no wa Kisama Da!!
The Greatest Battle in History. Raoh vs. Ken! You`re the One to Die!!
史上最強の戦いラオウVSケン! 死ぬのはきさまだ!!
